short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Augment the web with indicators that help detect phishing attempts

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The extension augments websites with additional visual information, allowing to make an informed decision about a website's legitimacy. The user can take into account context such as the origin of the link and the sensitivity of the information about to be entered.
